explanation: The loop used range(63) which iterates i = 0..62 and thus omits the final bit A[63]*2^63 â€” an off-by-one error. I corrected the loop to range(64) so it includes i=63. (This is an off-by-one fix pattern similar to the diffs that extend ranges by one.)
fixed_code:
A = list(map(int,input().split()))
S = 0

import math

for i in range(64):
    S = S + A[i]*(pow(2,i))
    
print(S)
